name: Flappy Bird (Unity Tutorial Version)
description: This is a version of Flappy Bird I made to brush up and practice my coding skills as well as refresh my memory on Unity's tools. The sprites all belong to Unity and were downloaded from the Asset store. I followed this tutorial: https://learn.unity.com/tutorial/live-session-making-a-flappy-bird-style-game?signup=true#. I DO NOT own any of the sprites. Enjoy!
